content:
I am a university fresh graduate, and I am looking for some opportunities in New York. Could you provide insights into some professional jobs in London?
Begin!
Question: You mentioned you are looking for opportunities in New York, but then asked for jobs in London. Should I search for job opportunities in New York or London?
I am looking for a teaching job

Great. To begin, I'll search for teaching jobs in New York since that was the initial place you mentioned, and then we will clarify more.

Now, I'll be using the search function to gather data on teaching profession opportunities in New York and see what kinds of roles are currently available there. Let me fetch that data.

name: search_for_jsearch
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'status': 'OK', 'request_id': '5a502bd7-39bf-452a-964b-0b82a7f900ca', 'parameters': {'query': 'teaching job in new york', 'page': 1, 'num_pages': 1, 'country': 'us', 'language': 'en'}, 'data': [{'job_id': 'VAgE-Pk9jafAixxxAAAAAA==', 'employer_name': 'Trinity School, NYC', 'employer_logo': 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ0gabFhtUx3zuQEFt2RI6AydOZ3NeFZQ70tHzk&s=0', 'employer_website': 'http://www.trinityschoolnyc.org/', 'employer_company_type': None, 'employer_linkedin': None, 'job_publisher': 'LinkedIn', 'job_employment_type': 'FULLTIME', 'job_employment_types': ['FULLTIME'], 'job_employment_type_text': 'Full-time', 'job_title': 'Kindergarten Head Teacher (September 1, 2025)', 'job_apply_link': 'https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/kindergarten-head-teacher-september-1-2025-at-trinity-school-nyc-4142862107?utm_campaign=google_jobs_apply&utm_source=google_jobs_apply&utm_medium=organic', 'job_apply_is_direct': False, 'job_apply_quality_score': None, 'apply_option...

I found several teaching job opportunities in New York. For instance, Trinity School in NYC is looking for a Kindergarten Head Teacher with a full-time employment type starting from September 1, 2025. This may give you the flexibility to organize and prepare if you are a fresh graduate.

Would you like to get more details about this job or hear about more options in New York? Alternatively, I can also look up teaching opportunities in London. Please specify your preference.

I found a specific opportunity for you at Trinity School in NYC. They are hiring for the role of Kindergarten Head Teacher starting on September 1, 2025. This position is full-time and the application is through LinkedIn, you can apply [here](https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/kindergarten-head-teacher-september-1-2025-at-trinity-school-nyc-4142862107?utm_campaign=google_jobs_apply&utm_source=google_jobs_apply&utm_medium=organic).

If you need details on more opportunities or jobs in another location, feel free to ask! Otherwise, if this aligns with your seeks, you may consider exploring this role.

function.name: Finish
